Title: Requires the commissioner of health to establish at least one state-operated COVID-19 vaccination site in certain counties outside of the city of New York
Summary: Requires the commissioner of health to establish at least one state-operated COVID-19 vaccination site in counties outside of the city of New York with a population of at least 300,000; provides that such site shall be open and operational with hours of operation, staffing levels and other resources necessary to ensure that such site operates in a substantially similar manner to other state-operated COVID-19 vaccination sites.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to requiring the commissioner of health to establish at least one state-operated COVID-19 vaccination site in certain counties outside of the city of New York
